author: markt
msg: Address issues 1 & 2 by using a ReadWriteLock to control access to the writer. This ensures messages won't be written while the writer is null. Note there is no (easy) way to not close the handler.
Address issue 3 by re-enabling the JULI shutdown hook if JULI is being used and Tomcat isn't stopped via a shutdown hook.
Address issue 4 by making ClassLoaderLogManager#useShutdownHook volatile

msg: Filter URL when displaying missing included page (markt)
